indications: Topically as a powder or wash for sores, dermatosis, toxic swellings and Damp, ulcerated skin
Lung Yin Deficiency and Deficiency Fire with chronic cough with Blood or Blood-streaked sputum
Various bleeding disorders such as uterine bleeding, hematochezia, bleeding gums, hematuria, and epistaxis

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with coughs due to external Wind-Cold.
Contraindicated for those with Heat in the Lungs.

interactions: Ingestion of drugs and this herb should be separated by at least two hours to avoid interference with proper absorption.

Topically as a salve for scars.

notes: Subcutaneous injections may cause local necrosis, restlessness, respiratory depression and death.
The part used is an excrescence produced by an insect (Melaphis Chinensis) on the leaf.
This herb treats throat Bi, wasting and thirsting, and night sweats.
This herb can be used alone as a powder for postpartum uterine prolapse, hematochezia and hematuria.
Use topically as a powder for epistaxis.
It can be powdered, moistened, placed in the umbilicus, covered and retained to treat spontaneous sweating or night sweats and children's nightmares.
The nuts themselves can be burned until they start smoking, exposing hemorrhoids to smoke with great results.
It can be used as a powder or as a wash topically for non-healing sores, ulcerations and carbuncles with oozing fluids.
For all toxic swellings, it should be fried until purplish black, powdered, mixed with honey and spread over the sore.

Both Wu Bei Zi and Per. Papaveris #{YingSuKe} Ying Su Ke astringe the Lungs to alleviate cough and the Intestines to stop diarrhea. Wu Bei Zi is sour astringent and cold, weaker in astringing the Lungs and Intestines, it is more appropriate for descending Fire, resolving toxicity, generating Yang fluids, stopping bleeding, securing Jing and astringing sweat. Ying Su Ke is a stronger astringent and effectively reduces pain.

The leaves, Folium Rhois Chinensis Yan Fu Ye, is sour, cool and enters the Liver and Lung channels. Its dosage is 9-15g. It Clears Heat, Cools the Blood, Clears Lung Heat, stops bleeding and dissolves Phlegm It is specific for malaria. It treats malaria, asthma, a swollen throat and measles.
